name: The Navigator
description:
Audiosensitive visualization by Kilian Ochs aka randomminimal (@oxxxmoxxx) and Janno Bergmann aka jannobergmann (@jb_nft), created under the collaborative project timemachine (@TimeMachineTez), featuring the sound piece "Arriving of The Navigator" by Dmitry Syzonenko aka dmitry.syzonenko (@DmitrySyzonenko).

Click into the canvas to load and play the sound.

Toggle camera rotation                [space bar]

Increase probing speed                 [arrow up]
Decrease probing speed               [arrow down]
View lower frequencies               [arrow left]
View higher frequencies             [arrow right]

Toggle elements                         [1]...[6]
Reset to defaults                             [r]
